effect.short: Calculates damage with the target's attacking stat.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage is calculated using the target's attacking stat rather than the user's.

flavorTexts.text:
The user turns the target’s power against it. The
higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the
move’s power.
